page.content: {POLITICS -}CARDROSS IS REPRESENTED BY AN INDEPENDENT COUNCILLOR, GEORGE HOOD ON THE LABOUR-CONTROLLED DUMBARTON DISTRICT COUNCIL. APATHY PREVAILS. THERE IS AN AMBIVALENT ATTITUDE TO THE SITING OF NUCLEAR BASES LOCALLY. PERHAPS APATHY ON LOCAL ISSUES IS DUE TO THE LARGE PROPORTION OF TRANSIENT FAMILIES!{ {QUESTIONNAIRE -}IN A SAMPLE SURVEY, IT EMERGED THAT DRUG-TAKING CAUSES MUCH CONCERN, BUT, ON THE OTHER HAND, THE RECENTLY-ESTABLISHED REHABILITATION CENTRE AT KILMAHEW IS VIEWED WITH SOME DISMAY.
